languages.text: Wearer’s melee area attacks gain +2 base damage for each affected target

traits.locale_text: Wearer’s melee area attacks gain +2 base damage for each affected target

languages.text: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.
languages.original_text: Wearer’s melee area attacks gain +2 base damage for each affected target

traits.locale_text: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行うと、影響を受けた対象1体ごとにベース{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+2増加する。
languages.original_text: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行うと、影響を受けた対象1体ごとにベース{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+2増加する。

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, базовый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 2 за каждую пораженную цель.
languages.original_text: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, базовый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 2 за каждую пораженную цель.

Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, базовый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 2 за каждую пораженную цель.

Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, базовый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 2 за каждую пораженную цель.

languages.text: Führt der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} aus, erhöht sich der Basis{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}schaden{/g} für jedes davon betroffene Ziel um +2.
languages.original_text: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

traits.locale_text: Führt der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} aus, erhöht sich der Basis{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}schaden{/g} für jedes davon betroffene Ziel um +2.

languages.text: Takan kişi {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirdiğinde taban {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, bu saldırıdan etkilenen her hedef için +2 artar.
languages.original_text: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirdiğinde taban {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, bu saldırıdan etkilenen her hedef için +2 artar.

languages.text: Lorsque le porteur effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de base sont augmentés de +2 pour chaque cible affectée.
languages.original_text: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le porteur effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de base sont augmentés de +2 pour chaque cible affectée.

languages.text: Cuando el portador efectúa un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} básico aumenta en +2 por cada objetivo afectado.
languages.original_text: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador efectúa un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} básico aumenta en +2 por cada objetivo afectado.

languages.text: 当装备者发动{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，每有一个受此次攻击影响的目标，此次攻击的基础{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}就提高2点。
languages.original_text: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者发动{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，每有一个受此次攻击影响的目标，此次攻击的基础{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}就提高2点。
